data.text: @Ennis52 @nsgov I know, a month is still too long.
@Hillier_10 @nsgov Do you listen to the Covid updates? They’re dropping restrictions earlier, rather then a three month plan.

@Mega_Halifax @nsgov And on the flipside, why do some people put their head in the sand instead of dealing with realities the last two years? Fear of uncertainty, which they mask with denial. Neurology 101.

@murphyj87 @nsgov @Doctors_NS If this was even remotely true we wouldn’t have gone through the last two years. We’ve spent two years being locked up. Restricted. Discriminated against. Had wedges driven between us. Could see our families. But yeah, they just want money. Wake up. It’s enough.
@ThatsI @GreatWhiteGato1 @nsgov Kinda like omicron is also not the direct cause of death. It's simply contributs to existing ailments and other comorbidities.
@murphyj87 @nsgov @Doctors_NS The end of restrictions was long overdue. There will always be some people that want the restrictions to stay forever, but most people seem ready to live again
@murphyj87 @nsgov @Doctors_NS its time to end it, its been over 2 years
@nsgov @Doctors_NS Because he rubber stamped the irresponsible Conservative covid measures,  Dr. Robert Strang should have his medical license revoked.
